lender.name: TMS MicroBank Students
lender.loan_because:
First, microfinance provides the maximum impact on the lives of those less fortunate, for the relatively small amount of money we have available to contribute.
Second, microfinance enables our contributions to have an ongoing impact, since microloans are repaid and can be lent out to new recipients over and over again.
Finally, our involvement in microfinance provides an ongoing educational benefit for our members, as we systematically research the economics of poverty. Specifically, we research the regional economies of prospective loaning areas, evaluate loan proposals of persons applying for assistance from our MicroBank, and learn to manage the ongoing and growing loan portfolio. It is a primary goal of our group that we develop a viable financial institution that provides ongoing development assistance to the poor as it grows in both size and financial stability over time.
While we all sometimes feel overwhelmed by the scope of the challenges facing our world, we are also inspired by the words of the famed anthropologist Margaret Mead: âNever doubt that a small group of committed, dedicated people can change the world. Indeed, it is the only thing that ever has.â
lender.occupational_info: Members of the Meadows MicroBank have agreed that our main objective is to develop an impactful approach to fighting poverty that could be managed by student volunteers and provide ongoing educational opportunities for the entire student body. We decided that Microfinance is the strategy that best meets our goals.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: Money makes the world go round, with this program a little goes a long way.
lender.occupational_info: I wish to entertain and provide some insights; or not.

lender.occupational_info: I was born and raised in El Salvador, and now live in the USA. I work with products or services from technology companies, and my job is to improve them or to come up with ideas for new products.

lender.occupational_info: I sold houses before I retired.

lender.name: Shirley
lender.loan_because: It gives me pleasure to help others, especially someone who is trying their best and still have not got enough to make their life easier. I, like most people, am not rich but believe we should share what we have to make this a better world to live in.
lender.occupational_info: I used to be a nurse but am retired now and I volunteer with the San Antonio, TX Audubon Society (a group of all age people who like to go birding together.) I am in charge of a Nature Trail near our large city. People go to there to walk, walk their pets, go birding and enjoy some time in the outdoors away from the city. The trail is among a lot of old tree and along a couple creeks. The creeks will quite often flood and therefore no homes etc. have been built in this flood plain. I also like to fish and sew. I love to travel but do not get out of the US very often.

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone should have the chance to succeed in their business or trade. Through bettering themselves, I hope these entreprenuers can better the lives of others.

lender.name: Melanie
lender.loan_because: My name is Melanie Guira and I worked as a private school teacher for 5 years here in Pangasinan, Philippines. I have four children and they are all going to school. My husband is jobless for quite sometime now and it is only me who worked very hard for our living. I have many students who come to me for tutorials, mostly with learning disabilities and or behavioral problems. I have plans of putting up my own nursery and tutorial school here in my place but thinking how much it will cost me in terms of renovations, materials including chairs and tables and other school items is quite expensive and I cannot afford the budget. My salary is not that competitive compared to a public school teacher. I just want to help other children who are still coping up with their studies in reading, math, writing and comprehension and those with ADHD,mild mental retardation and autism. I know I will be able to help parents in giving their children quality education and not minding about how much would they pay me as I am very much openminded with the financial crisis we are having. I hope thru this website I will be able to make my dreams come true.
lender.occupational_info: I find my work very demanding, dedicating, fun, enjoyable and creative. This is my passion and commitment. I love my work.

lender.name: Emily & Scott
